name: LearnEnglishGrammer-wordgame
0:
”Alexa, play word game”
”Alexa, start word game”
”Alexa, open word game”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: word game
des:
This is an English grammar game where you will be asked 5 questions related to English grammar. Score points by listening to a word and identifying the correct synonym or antonym, one word, phrase, verbs, and questions that are asked in government exams from three options. This will test your word knowledge and tell your score at the end of the skill. As much as u try your score will improve day by day. There are over 1000 words. The word database is sufficient to improve your vocabulary and face any major examination anywhere in the world. I covered questions that prepare students for MBA, Civil Services, Banking, CTET, SSC, GMAT, GRE, Engineering, LAW, BBA and many other exams and tests.
you can try skill by saying "Alexa, start word game" or you can "Alexa, play word game".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
